message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to consider that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a profit. I can do $135, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $125?
I'm getting close to my minimum, but I still need to make a profit. I can do $130, but that's as low as I can go. This is my final offer.
I understand this is your final offer, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $127?
I'm not budging from my previous offer, but I'll give you one more chance. I'm sticking with $130, no lower. Take it or leave it.
I'm really close to walking away, but I still want to try to make a deal. Would you be willing to meet me at $128?
I'm not going to give you a better deal than $130, but I'll throw in a small concession. I'll meet you at $129, and that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate the concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $126, and that's my final offer.
